scene_description_enriched: A female figure, likely a saint, stands in a landscape holding a book and a staff. She wears a blue tunic and a red cloak lined with gold. Above and to her right, a winged figure, possibly an angel, descends, holding a sword or a similar implement. In the background, stylized castles and trees are depicted against a blue sky. The overall scene suggests a narrative moment, possibly a divine intervention or a saintly attribute.
